item.title: Buying a Minivan
item.description: The time comes in every man’s life where he eventually has to break down and buy a minivan. That time has come. The Altima is on it’s last legs and we really need a vehicle which can seat our whole family plus a couple visitors plus luggage. Only a minivan fits those requirements. I’ll probably wait until the spring to buy. That’s when the annual Consumer Reports auto issue comes out.
